price: 他们舍安拉而崇拜（偶像），那是不能为他们主持从天上降下的和从地上生出的一点给养的，而且毫无能力的。
arabic: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَمۡلِكُ لَهُمۡ رِزۡقٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yamliku lahum riz'qan mina al-samāwāti wal-arḍi shayan walā yastaṭīʿūna
